
```{r}

library(ggplot2)
```
```{r}
my_mean<-gapminder_data%>%group_by(year)%>%summarize(pop_mean=mean(pop))
```
```{r}
knitr::kable(my_mean)
```
```{r}

```

```{r}
the_sum<-sum(a)
the_numbers<-length(a)
the_mean<-the_sum/the_numbers
the_mean

```
```{r}
my_mean<-function(x){
the_mean<-sum(x)/length(x)  
return(the_mean)
}
```

```{r}
my_mean(a)
```
